item.title: Advantages of Dedicated Point to Point Fiber
item.description: By: John Shepler If your business’s broadband internet is causing you problems, you might want to consider dedicated point-to-point lines. Let’s explore what they are and how they can benefit you. What Does Dedicated Mean? Dedicated means you have exclusive access to the bandwidth you pay for. You might wonder, “Isn’t all bandwidth dedicated if I’m paying for it?” Here’s where it gets a little complicated. Broadband providers often advertise services with phrases like “bandwidth up to 300 Mbps.

item.title: Harmoney proudly displays impressive first-year results
item.description: The remarkable first-year performance of Harmoney, New Zealand’s sole peer-to-peer (P2P) lending platform, highlights a substantial unmet need for crowdfunded microloans. Established on September 10, 2014, with NZ$100 million in committed capital from prominent institutions like Blue Elephant Capital Management and Heartland Bank, Harmoney has facilitated NZ$100 million in personal loans within its inaugural year. The company’s rapid expansion has resulted in the creation of 65 new jobs across New Zealand, Australia, and Fiji, with plans underway for an Australian launch.
